proposal: Hello Katana Inu gamers! Congrats on reaching 22027 holders! Your sword-swinging, spell-casting, NFT-collecting game is a real game changer in the web3 world. How about adding a bit of twist? With our DEX tool, you could have your own Uniswap V2 based exchange, or with our Lottery tool, players could try their luck for some extra fun. Just imagine, a Katana Inu lottery or your very own Katana DEX! See my profile for demo and details.
